alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:45PM CDT until June 14 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Helena, or 9 miles southwest of St. Joseph, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Church Hill around 455 PM CDT. Alcorn State around 500 PM CDT. Lorman around 505 PM CDT. Fayette, Red Lick and Mcnair around 510 PM CDT. Blue Hill around 520 PM CDT. Union Church, Pleasant Hill, Mcbride and New Hope around 525 PM CDT. Mccall Creek around 535 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
